sentences.sentence: He complained to his wife Abigail, "My country has in its wisdom contrived for me the most insignificant office that ever the invention of man contrived or his imagination conceived.
sentences.translation: 他曾对他的妻子阿比盖尔抱怨，“我们的国家自做聪明，拿那个最不起眼的职位给我，可能就是某个人即兴杰作或者是他的想象。”

sentences.sentence: As wife of the first Vice President, Abigail became a good friend to Mrs. Washington and a valued help in official entertaining, drawing on her experience of courts and society abroad.
sentences.translation: 作为第一副总统夫人，阿比盖尔成为华盛顿夫人要好的朋友，依靠她在法院和国外的生活经验，对于官方娱乐活动提供了有益的帮助。

sentences.sentence: Even before it blooms, though, the Queen of the Andes has a regal presence, towering up to 40 feet (12 meters) in its mountain habitats of Peru and Bolivia.
